description: This file appears to be a React component for a weather application homepage, handling UI, state management, and interactions with various components and API functions.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the weather application's homepage, managing weather data, location selection, and user interactions.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Updates the selected location based on user search input.

methods.name: handleLocateMe
methods.description: Uses browser geolocation to set the current location for weather data.

methods.name: handleAddLocation
methods.description: Adds a new location to the list, with optimistic UI update.

methods.name: handleRemoveLocation
methods.description: Removes a location from the list.
